# Contributor License Agreement

By submitting a pull request to this repository, you agree to the following:

1. **You grant Tech Integration Labs LLC a perpetual, worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free, irrevocable license** to use, reproduce, modify, distribute, sublicense, and create derivative works from your contribution, in any medium or format.

2. **You represent that you have the legal right** to grant the above license. If your employer has rights to intellectual property that you create, you represent that you have received permission to make the contribution on behalf of that employer.

3. **You represent that your contribution is your original work** and does not violate any third-party rights.

4. **You understand that your contribution will be licensed** under the same license as the project (AGPL v3), and that Tech Integration Labs LLC may also offer the project under alternative commercial licenses.

5. **You are not expected to provide support** for your contribution unless you choose to do so.

## How It Works

When you open your first pull request, a bot will ask you to sign this CLA by commenting on the PR. You only need to sign once -- it covers all future contributions.

## Questions?

Open an issue or contact us at [GitHub Discussions](https://github.com/TechIntegrationLabs/bizbrain-os/discussions).
